name: growbot-web
description: Web app for my Growbot library.

scripts.test: mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --ui bdd --reporter nyan --require spec/javascripts/spec_helper.coffee spec/javascripts/**/*spec.coffee
scripts.test-watch: mocha --watch --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --ui bdd --reporter nyan --require spec/javascripts/spec_helper.coffee spec/javascripts/**/*spec.coffee

author: Dave Long <dave@davejlong.com>
